mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT(PRODUCT_ID, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE,PRODUCT_SALES_STATUS_YN, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_RATE, NUMBER_OF_PRODUCT, PRODUCT_CATEGORY) values (#{productId}, #{memberId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productSalesStatusYN}, #{productDiscountRate}, #{numberOfProduct}, #{productCategory})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice}, PRODUCT_CHANGED_DATE = #{productChangedDate}, PRODUCT_SALES_STATUS_YN = #{productSalesStatusYN}, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_RATE = #{productDiscountRate}, NUMBER_OF_PRODUCT = #{numberOfProduct}, PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{productCategory}, PRODUCT_CHANGED_DATE = #{productChangedDate} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
